original_text: The Lord your God has increased your numbers so that today you are as numerous as the stars in the sky.
korean_text: 너희의 하나님 여호와께서 너희를 번성하게 하셨으므로 너희가 오늘날 하늘의 별 같이 많거니와

sentences.original_text: The Lord your God has increased your numbers
sentences.korean_translation: 주 당신의 하나님께서 당신의 수를 늘리셨으니

sentences.original_text: you are as numerous as the stars in the sky
